column2: countries <- tmp %>% filter(TGT_COUNTRY == "DENMARK" || TGT_COUNTRY == "AUSTRIA" || TGT_COUNTRY == "BELGIUM" || TGT_COUNTRY == "FRANCE" || TGT_COUNTRY == 'GERMANY' || TGT_COUNTRY == 'ITALY' || TGT_COUNTRY == 'CHINA' || TGT_COUNTRY == 'POLAND' || TGT_COUNTRY == 'JAPAN')
g <- ggplot(countries, aes(x = date, y = count)) +
scale_x_date(labels = date_format("%m-%Y")) + facet_wrap(TGT_COUNTRY ~ ., nrow = 3, ncol = 3, scales ="free_y")
